Uses of Class
com.gsma.services.rcs.session.MultimediaSessionListener

  • Packages that use MultimediaSessionListener 
    Package Description
    com.gsma.services.rcs.session
    This API exposes all functionality to initiate multimedia sessions between two end points based on a dedicated service ID (or feature tag).

    • Uses of MultimediaSessionListener in com.gsma.services.rcs.session

      Methods in com.gsma.services.rcs.session with parameters of type MultimediaSessionListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MultimediaSession.addEventListener(MultimediaSessionListener listener)
      Adds a listener on session events
      MultimediaSession MultimediaSessionService.initiateSession(java.lang.String serviceId, java.lang.String contact, MultimediaSessionListener listener)
      Initiates a new multimedia session for real time messaging with a remote contact and for a given service.
      void MultimediaSession.removeEventListener(MultimediaSessionListener listener)
      Removes a listener on session events
